After thinking about it, Meg agrees to take the job. Lily breaks the news to Holden that she is going on a cruise with Luke and Noah. At first, Holden is against the idea, but he gives in and advises Lily to go. Jack and Parker let Carly know that his car was in a chop shop. Parker wants Craig arrested for being behind this, but Jack refuses to arrest Craig.
